value.value: You must specify id or email to identify contact

value.expression:
body.result.map(function (c) { return ({
    id: c.id,
    email: c.email,
    phone: c.phone_number,
    firstName: c.first_name,
    lastName: c.last_name,
    country: c.country,
    customProperties: c.custom_fields,
}); })
value.source:
body.result.map((c) => ({
        id: c.id,
        email: c.email,
        phone: c.phone_number,
        firstName: c.first_name,
        lastName: c.last_name,
        country: c.country,
        customProperties: c.custom_fields,
      }))
